name: Outskirt Raiders
background: The Guilds of the Nexus are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal guild wars on the streets of the Nexus. These guilds are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular guild, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

spells.name: Poison Blades
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get Raider Boost once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Cracked Ground
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 12", which takes 2 hits with AP(1) and Shred.

spells.name: Armor Breaker
spells.effect: Pick up to four enemy units within 18", which get -1 to defense rolls once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: params.thisUnit ? 0 : this.getUnitBaseCostDiff({ quality: 4, defense: 5, tough: 2, rules: ["Tough"] }, { defense: 5 - params.effect.rollModifier.value })

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Earth Blast
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 12", which take 3 hits each.

spells.name: Wild Hunt
spells.effect: Pick up to six friendly units within 12", which get Ranged Slayer once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Cutting Whirlwind
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 12", which take 2 hits with Scratch each.

specialRules.name: Stealth Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Stealth. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Raider
specialRules.description: When attacking, targets must re-roll unmodified Defense results of 6 when blocking hits from this model's weapons.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Precision Fighter Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get +1 to hit rolls in melee. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Ambush Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Ambush. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Ravage
specialRules.description: When it's this model's turn to attack in melee, roll X dice. For each 6+ the target takes one wound.

specialRules.name: Raider Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Raider Boost. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Defense Debuff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which gets -1 to defense rolls once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Scratch
specialRules.description: Against non-Hero units with Tough(3) or more, this weapon gets AP(+2).

specialRules.name: Precision Tag
specialRules.description: Once per game, during this model's activation, pick one enemy unit within 36" and in line of sight of it, and place X markers on it. When attacking, friendly units may remove markers from their target before rolling to hit to get +Y to hit rolls, where Y is the number of removed markers.

specialRules.name: Surge when Shooting Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Surge when shooting. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Stealth
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule are shot from over 9" away, enemy units get -1 to hit rolls.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Raider Boost
specialRules.description: If this model has Raider, enemies taking hits from it must re-roll successful unmodified defense results of 5-6 from Raider (instead of only on 6).

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Tough
specialRules.description: This model only rolls to check wound effects once it has taken at least X wounds, and is only Knocked Out on rolls of 5+X or more.

specialRules.name: Surge
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 6 to hit, this weapon deals 1 extra hits (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Shred
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 1 to block hits, this weapon deals 1 extra wound.

specialRules.name: Ranged Slayer
specialRules.description: This model's ranged weapons get AP(+2) against units where most models have Tough(3) or higher.
